column4: can someone tell me how to take a an iso of a dvd and burn it to dvd
an iso of a concert not a data iso
sorry, I don't follow -- an iso of a concert?
well it is a dvd of a concert preformance
hmm, well if you open up the dvd, does it have an audo folder and a video folder?
then you should be able to make a data iso, which will burn fine on to a new dvd
semitones havent tried willit then play in the pc or a dvd player?
afaik, it will play in a dvd player, unless there are multiple "tracks" on the dvd which the computer can't see
but this isn't usually the case with dvds
